## Resources interface

Resources allocated to a deployment

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface Resources 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [ram](./js.resources.ram.md) |  | [ByteSizeString](./js.bytesizestring.md) | Amount of memory to allocate in a readible format You can use the <code>parseSize</code> function to convert this to bytes. |
|  [vcpu](./js.resources.vcpu.md) |  | number | Amount of vCPU to allocate |
|  [vgpu](./js.resources.vgpu.md) |  | [Vgpu](./js.vgpu.md)<!-- -->\[\] | vGPUs to allocate |
